meanings.definition: A type of icing or filling used in cakes and pastries.
meanings.sent1: The baker carefully spread fondant on top of the cake.
meanings.sent2: The fondant on the cupcake was smooth and sweet.
meanings.sent3: The fondant decided to take a sweet nap on the cake.
meanings.sent4: The fondant was like a sugary blanket covering the dessert.
meanings.sent5: The fondant added a delicious touch to the pastry.

meanings.definition: A soft, creamy candy made from sugar, water, and other flavorings.
meanings.sent1: She enjoyed the fondant as a sugary treat after dinner.
meanings.sent2: The fondant melted in her mouth, leaving a sweet taste.
meanings.sent3: The fondant candy giggled as it was being eaten.
meanings.sent4: The fondant was a sugary cloud in her mouth.
meanings.sent5: The fondant candy was a delightful indulgence.
